name: Face-recognition-attendance-system
description: An advanced attendance management system that leverages face recognition technology and Firebase integration. This project automates the attendance process, records precise date and time down to seconds, and offers a user-friendly interface for administrators. Enhance data accuracy and streamline attendance tracking with this innovative solution.

name: HR-Support-System
description: HR Support System - Data Corp Revolutionize your HR processes with our HR Support System. Predict attrition, job satisfaction, and performance ratings with machine learning. Access HR assistance through our chatbot. Visualize HR data on our interactive dashboard.

name: Audio_Video_Intelligence
description: A ai powered system that does audio and face emotion analysis with just a video as a input, it extracts the audio and does the audio analysis.

name: ai_course-builder
description: A great use of ai for making your own course by just adding good keywords of your course topic.
